title: Solr mapreduce doesn't work in kerberized environment
description: Jobs, skeltons and tools available in mapreduce do not work with Kerberos. Ie MapReduceIndexerTool is breaking up at Golive phase when it needs to execute HTTP action in kerberized solr. Entire story is written on hortonworks community forum, however it affects solr in very same way.

comments.author: Łukasz Dywicki
comments.content: Wider description of problem with work around.
